attributes.action: To Change the Age of Consent to 14
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to change the age of consent for sexual intercourse to 14 years where both parties are under 18 years of age therefore preventing innocent teenagers from being criminalised for normal experimentation.

rejection.details:
Please can you resubmit and change the title.

May I suggest the following: "reduce age of consent to 14 where both parties are below 18.”

Kind regards.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
